DOC.brief_summary: To compare efficacy safety result intravitreal bevacizumab alone bevacizumab + triamcinolone acetonide neovascular AMD .
DOC.brief_title: Intravitreal Bevacizumab vs. Bevacizumab Combined With Triamcinolone Neovascular AMD
DOC.criteria: Cases active neovascular AMD visual acuity 20/400 20/40 History glaucoma ocular hypertension Disciform scar
